title: 有關香港對網上平台發出臨時禁制令事宜

replies.msg:
LIHKG 管理團隊從網上新聞媒體得知，香港律政司司長入稟香港高等法院申請禁制令，禁止任何人非法於網上論壇及通訊軟件發表煽動暴力言論。

本討論區目前並未收到由香港法院發出之禁制令，亦未掌握其確實內容，故此未能作出評論；當有最新消息後將會另行公告，用戶請密切關注本討論區所發佈之最新消息。

管理團隊在此促請香港政府聆聽市民訴求，勿以打壓方式解決提出問題的一方，損害香港國際聲譽。

The LIHKG management team learned from the online news media that the Secretary for Justice of Hong Kong has applied to the Hong Kong High Court for an injunction prohibiting anyone from illegally publishing violent remarks in online forums and communication software.

The forum has not yet received a ban issued by the Hong Kong courts, and it does not have the exact content. Therefore, it cannot be commented on. The latest news will be announced separately. Users should pay close attention to the latest issues posted on this forum. information.

The management team here urges the Hong Kong government to listen to the public's request and not to solve the problem by pressure and damage Hong Kong's international reputation.
